net.sf.jclal.util.random

Class AbstractRandGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.util.random.AbstractRandGen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, JCLAL, IRandGen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaRandom, Ranecu, Ranlux, Ranmar, Ranmt

    public abstract class AbstractRandGen
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRandGen
    Base implementation of the IRandGen interface.
    Author:
    Sebstian Ventura
    See Also:
